title: Final Fantasy VII [Steam Edition]
description:

Installation:
1) Unrar
2) Burn or mount the image
3) Install the game
4) Copy the content from /Crack directory on the DVD to the directory of the game. We recommend firewalling all game exes as well
5) Play the game. The launcher will fail at getting updates. Click continue
6) When you save/load you must wait for the online sync to fail until you can save/load
7) Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
